A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Stunning. Rian Johnson made a great Star Wars film that had its controversial points\, but they were necessary to expand the series and Star Wars in general. Weird seeing the story move past the Skywalkers as being the central focus\, but it needed to be done. Also\, cudos to RJ for completely giving the bird to JJ Abrams’ biggest story plot holes left in TFA. Amazing SW movie... maybe the best one.
